Once nobody was in the room but Gangon, he slowly waited. Lightmare came ba=
ck into the room.

"Gangon, we can have new bodies built for us and--" Ligh=
tmare was suddenly cut off by Gangon.

"Lightmare, I don't care! Pick up th=
e glass on the floor, kill me! Use one of your weapons! Strangle me! Rip my=
 guts out! I don't care, just kill me!!!" Gangon screamed. It seemed nobody=
 heard. Lighmare's eyes were huge.

"I can't, I can't kill someone who want=
s to die!" Lightmare said. She ran from the room as fast as she could, Gang=
on screaming at her to come back. Gangon started to cry and whine. Lightmar=
e stepped outside of the base, and looked around. She wondered off about 4 =
miles away, stumbling a few times, she had to get used to this cane for a w=
hile.

"Are you scared?" Said the mysterious voice.

"Who's there?" Lightma=
re asked in fear.

"I'm here." Said the voice.

"Sinesis, Sinister, show yo=
urselves!" Lightmare screamed. A laser blast threw her backwards, the cane =
flying throuhg the air and landing into a hand. Deemos stood there, the evi=
l wizard bot standing in all of his glory.

"You never thanked me." Deemos =
whispered. Lightmare groaned and tried to crawl.

"I created you, I can des=
troy you!" Deemos yelled. Lightmare crawled away.

"No!" She yelled. Deeemo=
s just laughed. Deemos threw the cane, it bounced off of the ground and fle=
w into the sky. Deemos laughed and jerked up Lightmare by her bad arm. She =
yelled in pain. Deemos laughed. Inzola appears.

"Meet my wife, Inzola!" De=
emos said. Inzola laughed. Deemos jerked Ligghtmare over and held her in fr=
ont of Inzola's face.

"Kind of small, isn't she? You do her a favor and sh=
e just runs off!" Inzola says. Inzola and Deemos shoot powerful beams of en=
ergy that blows Lightmare to the ground, her arm becoming unattached.

"Now=
 my dear, you DIE!" Inzola said. Deemos and Inzola laugh as the cane comes =
back to earth, piercing through lightmare's chest. Lightmare gasped in pain=
. She grew weak, bleeding everywhere. Inzola grabbed a spark removing claw,=
 and to Deemos' delite, ripped Lightmare's spark out. Deemos opened a conta=
iner and Inzola placed the spark inside. Deemos put it away into Cyberspace=
.

"Be a great decoration for out cave!" Deemos said.

"Yes, I feel soooo g=
ood to have killed someone as soon as we arived!" Inzola said.

"Yes, our k=
ill will be fuel enough for a while, but we need more!" Deemos said. Deemos=
 turned into a vulture and flew over, grabbing Lightmare's body.

"Give me =
a hand!" Deemos said. Inzola nodded and transformed into a really big termi=
te, even bigger than Deemos. They grabbed Lightmare's body and drug it to t=
heir cave to feast upon her flesh, while they keep her spark, in their coll=
ection. They both laugh evily...
